<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_359</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_359</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Interpretación geométrica de la derivada</string>
            <string language="en">Graphical representation derivative</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Graphische Darstellung Ableitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dérivé graphique de représentation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Derivative gráfico da respresentação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Derivato grafico della rappresentazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραφικό παράγωγο αντιπροσώπευσης</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de derivada de una función en un punto. Se estudia la interpretación geométrica de la derivada como pendiente de la recta tangente en el punto.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study the concept of derivative of a function at a point. It studies the geometric interpretation of the derivative of a function as the slope of the line tangent to a point of the graph of that function.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">pendiente</string>
            <string language="en">slope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">derivada</string>
            <string language="en">derivative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">recta tangente</string>
            <string language="en">tangent line</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tangente trigonométrica</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometric tangent</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der Ableitung einer Funktion an einem Punkt 
zu studieren. Er studiert die geometrische Deutung der Ableitung
einer Funktion als die Steigung der Zeile Tangente zu einem Punkt des 
Diagramms dieser Funktion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier le concept du dérivé d'une fonction à un 
point. Il étudie la traduction géométrique du dérivé d'une 
fonction comme pente de la ligne tangente à un point du graphique de 
cette fonction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar o
conceito do derivative de uma função em um ponto. Estuda a 
interpretação geométrica do derivative de uma função como a 
inclinação da linha tangent a um ponto do gráfico dessa função.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare il concetto del derivato di una funzione ad un punto. 
Studia l'interpretazione geometrica del derivato di una funzione
come il pendio della riga tangente ad un punto del grafico di quella 
funzione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να μελετήσει την έννοια του παραγώγου μιας λειτουργίας σε ένα
σημείο. Μελετά τη γεωμετρική ερμηνεία του παραγώγου μιας 
λειτουργίας ως κλίση της εφαπτομένης γραμμών σε ένα σημείο της 
γραφικής παράστασης εκείνης της λειτουργίας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Steigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ableitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tangentezeile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">trigonometrische Tangente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dérivé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fonction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ligne de tangente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tangente trigonométrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inclinação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">derivative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">função</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">linha do tangent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tangent trigonometric</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pendio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">derivato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">funzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riga di tangente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tangente trigonometrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κλίση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παράγωγο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λειτουργία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμμή εφαπτομένης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">trigonometric εφαπτομένη</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
